医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
童年不良经历越多，头部或颈部受伤和脑震荡的可能性越大Altaf Saadi，医学博士、理学硕士，麻省总医院神经病学系神经差异与健康正义实验室首席研究员，哈佛医学院神经病学助理教授，是《头部创伤与康复杂志》上一项新研究的主要作者，检查美国儿童的不良童年经历与一生中头部或颈部受伤或脑震荡史之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Higher-adverse-childhood-experiences-linked-to-greater-odds-of-head-or-neck-injury-and-concussions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Higher-adverse-childhood-experiences-linked-to-greater-odds-of-head-or-neck-injury-and-concussions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=585eb28b-aef5-4b81-a100-8f47529d13ca Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:34:00 -0400 Higher adverse childhood experiences linked to greater odds of head or neck injury and concussions
研究发现生活在污染地区的孕妇生出的婴儿更小根据将在意大利米兰举行的欧洲呼吸学会国际大会上公布的研究，暴露于空气污染的女性会生出较小的婴儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Pregnant-women-living-in-polluted-areas-more-likely-to-have-smaller-babies-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Pregnant-women-living-in-polluted-areas-more-likely-to-have-smaller-babies-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=528d1302-5031-4ce3-9c06-d2f979b1ad8f Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:25:00 -0400 Pregnant women living in polluted areas more likely to have smaller babies, study finds
研究综述重点关注裸盖菇素治疗抑郁症的用途越来越多的证据表明迷幻药物可能有助于治疗各种心理健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Research-review-focuses-on-the-use-of-psilocybin-for-treatment-of-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Research-review-focuses-on-the-use-of-psilocybin-for-treatment-of-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac9f455a-923f-4fdd-a8d1-c704de9017d2 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:18:00 -0400 Research review focuses on the use of psilocybin for treatment of depression
植入式传感器可对大鼠肾移植失败发出预警研究人员报告说，植入式传感器可以对大鼠肾移植失败发出预警，比常用的肾功能生物标志物提前几周。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Implantable-sensor-provides-advanced-warning-of-kidney-transplant-failure-in-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Implantable-sensor-provides-advanced-warning-of-kidney-transplant-failure-in-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34259407-9c2a-435d-a52e-15ddd5d6e29d Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:10:00 -0400 Implantable sensor provides advanced warning of kidney transplant failure in rats
CAR-T 细胞疗法的新方法可以减少副作用当 Richard O'Neil 博士两年前加入 MUSC Hollings 癌症中心时，他知道自己想要继续寻找让 CAR-T 细胞治疗对患者更容易的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/New-way-to-administer-CAR-T-cell-therapy-could-lead-to-fewer-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/New-way-to-administer-CAR-T-cell-therapy-could-lead-to-fewer-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=631d080c-6b6d-4b15-8ac2-d8349be12f69 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:04:00 -0400 New way to administer CAR-T-cell therapy could lead to fewer side effects
西奈山研究人员确定了一种特殊红细胞转运蛋白的结构西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员已经确定了红细胞中发现的特殊转运蛋白的结构及其与药物的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Mount-Sinai-researchers-identify-the-struct-of-a-special-red-blood-cell-transporter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Mount-Sinai-researchers-identify-the-struct-of-a-special-red-blood-cell-transporter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=debd11af-4abc-4a6b-b161-e9c03904d1a9 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:58:00 -0400 Mount Sinai researchers identify the structure of a special red blood cell transporter
研究表明性行为如何随着年龄而变化今天发表的一项新研究表明，随着年龄的增长，我们的性伴侣数量会发生变化，并且有一些令人惊讶的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Study-shows-how- Sex-behaviors-change-with-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Study-shows-how- Sex-behaviors-change-with-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=612b8b4c-81fc-4e1b-8193-b659fd875a6f Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:52:00 -0400 Study shows how sexual behaviors change with age
临床前研究为首次临床膀胱移植做准备提供了重要的第一步据美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊 The Journal of Urology® 10 月号报道，一系列临床前研究为开发人类机器人膀胱移植技术迈出了重要的第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Bladder-Transplantation-In-Humans-Initial-Studies-To-Develop-Technique.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Bladder-Transplantation-In-Humans-Initial-Studies-To-Develop-Technique.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96a2b45c-46b0-430a-b9ec-0de0b97386dd Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:47:00 -0400 Pre-clinical studies provide important first steps to prepare for first clinical bladder transplant
使用生物电子设备捕获和释放肿瘤细胞在题为《癌症诊断微流体系统》的书中，UPV/EHU 的微流体集群小组描述了构建生物电子设备的过程，该设备由涂有智能聚合物的金电极组成，能够以非侵入性、可控的方式捕获和释放细胞，同时进行监测使用传统电气测量的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Capture-and-release-of-tumor-cells-using-a-bioelectric-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Capture-and-release-of-tumor-cells-using-a-bioelectric-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=466812ef-a839-4345-90a1-00623982ecb5 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:32:42 -0400 Capture and release of tumor cells using a bioelectronic device
研究显示，妊娠期糖尿病之后的 2 型糖尿病存在严重的种族和民族不平等哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼学院流行病学副教授、流行病学家 Teresa Janevic 博士的一项新研究表明，妊娠期糖尿病后，糖尿病中的种​​族和族裔不平等现象已经确立，但这些不平等现象相当严重，并且一直是孕产妇健康公平性中被忽视的一个方面。公共卫生。迄今为止，关于妊娠期糖尿病 (GDM) 后 2 型糖尿病的种族和民族差异的研究还很有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Racial-and-ethnic-inequities-are-substantial-in-type-2-diabetes-after-gestational-diabetes-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Racial-and-ethnic-inequities-are-substantial-in-type-2-diabetes-after-gestational-diabetes-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a787a51-b926-4972-9b1c-caa66da02d48 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:28:00 -0400 Racial and ethnic inequities are substantial in type 2 diabetes after gestational diabetes, study shows
